original_text: You know that Jesus came into the world so that he might take away our sins. He himself is completely clean from sin.
korean_text: 그가 우리 죄를 없애려고 나타나신 것을 너희가 아나니 그에게는 죄가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: You know that Jesus came into the world
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 예수님이 세상에 오셨다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: so that he might take away our sins
He himself is completely clean from sin
